app_title: Steam Achievement Localizer by Pan_Vena ver
warning_message:
Possible bugs, for questions please refer to the GitHub page, or write in private on Telegram: @Pan_Vena, Discord: pan_vena
or just E-mail: pan.vena@ukr.net
Other my contact details can be found in 'About App'
steam_folder_label: Select path to Steam folder (For example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam)
game_id_label: Enter game ID or Steam store link (For example: https://store.steampowered.com/app/257510/The_Talos_Principle/)
save_bin_unknown: Save bin file to Steam folder
export_bin: Open current bin file in Explorer
save_changes_msg: Do you want to save your changes before exiting?
save_where_msg: Where do you want to save your changes?
about_message:
The app is made for translating Steam achievements names.

In case of questions:
- Telegram: @Pan_Vena
- Discord: pan_vena
- GitHub: PanVena
- E-mail: pan.vena@ukr.net

Also thanks for pull requests: Zergatul, Nick Defrunct Ñ– veydzh3r
error_no_id:
Enter game ID or link to it,
which you know from the top of the Steam store page
export_csv_for_translate_info:
Export to CSV for translation includes columns: key, english, translation and selected context language.
After translation, fill in the 'translation' column and import the file back into the program and select 'english' as language to replace.
error_no_english:
Missing 'english' column.
That means the file is not loaded.
import_csv_info:
Importing CSV will replace the selected language with values from the 'translation' column if it is filled in.
Select 'english' or any other language as language for replace before importing.
error_no_end_was_found: Cannot find the end of the line.
error_nothing_after_english: Could not find end of string after 'english'.
error_manually_selected_file: You have loaded the file from some other folder, go save it somewhere else
in_steam_folder_saved: File saved in Steam folder. Restart Steam to see changes.
file_saved:
File saved successfully in: {save_path}

Don't forget to restart Steam when you`ll put this file back to Steam folder.
folder_not_found_auto: Could not find Steam folder automatically
gamename_list: Game name or its code name
delete_stats_file_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this bin file?
{path}
Do you want to save a CSV backup and then delete it?
delete_stats_file: Delete bin file(if there is a problem)
delete_stats_file_done: Bin file with {gamename} achievements names deleted.
